passages.text:
Ah, you again! So, how are you enjoying your lodgings?
[[The trailer is a bit drafty.|Drafty]]
[[It's perfect, thank you!|Perfect]]

links.name: The trailer is a bit drafty.|Drafty
links.link: The trailer is a bit drafty.|Drafty

passages.name: Start

passages.text:
Well of course it is! How else would you fully take in the fresh sea air that you traveled so far to enjoy?
[[I told you, I'm not here for vacation.|No vacation]]
[[I guess you're right.|Youre right]]

links.name: I told you, I'm not here for vacation.|No vacation
links.link: I told you, I'm not here for vacation.|No vacation

passages.name: Drafty

passages.text:
See, I knew the moment I saw you that you were the type that understands quality when you see it! You have the critical eye of an artist! And I'm sure an artist such as yourself would be simply ecstatic at the opportunity to take in everything this wonderful location has to offer.
[[Continue2]]
passages.name: Perfect

passages.text:
Hmm, is that so? Well, regardless, you don't have to be on vacation to enjoy everything this wonderful location has to offer! Can I interest you in a scenic boat ride? For a small fee, of course.
[[Could the boat take me back to the mainland?|Mainland]]
[[No thanks. I have to get back to fishing.|Fishing to do]]

links.name: Could the boat take me back to the mainland?|Mainland
links.link: Could the boat take me back to the mainland?|Mainland

links.name: No thanks. I have to get back to fishing.|Fishing to do
links.link: No thanks. I have to get back to fishing.|Fishing to do

passages.name: No vacation

passages.text:
Yes, yes. See, for a moment there, it almost seemed like you weren't grateful for the generosity I've bestowed upon you. Almost as if I hadn't provided you with a sturdy roof over your head when I was under no obligation to do so.
[[Continue]]
passages.name: Youre right

passages.text:
Oh no, of course not. This is a strictly leisure-oriented activity. Besides, the only boat capable of making a journey through waters that rough won't be leaving until after the festival.
[[I have fishing to do.|Fishing to do]]

links.name: I have fishing to do.|Fishing to do
links.link: I have fishing to do.|Fishing to do

passages.name: Mainland

passages.text: Harrumph. Well, don't let me keep you from such an "important" task..
passages.name: Fishing to do

passages.text:
But that would be quite silly, wouldn't it?
[[Yes it would.|Yes silly]]
[[Actually...|No silly]]
passages.name: Continue

passages.text:
I thought so. Now, let's take a moment to talk about the many amazing amenities available to you (for a small fee) at this delightful location.
[[I have fishing to do.|Fishing to do]]

links.name: I have fishing to do.|Fishing to do
links.link: I have fishing to do.|Fishing to do

passages.name: Yes silly

passages.text:
Let me stop you right there. I have better things to do that listen to a stranger - a beggarly stranger, no less - lecture me about the integrity of my facilities. And I trust that you do as well. Or do you spend the majority of your time accosting innocent small business owners?
[[I have fishing to do.|Fishing to do]]

links.name: I have fishing to do.|Fishing to do
links.link: I have fishing to do.|Fishing to do

passages.name: No silly

passages.text:
Mayhaps I can interest you in a scenic boat ride? For a small fee, of course.
[[Could the boat take me back to the mainland?|Mainland]]
[[No thanks. I have to get back to fishing.|Fishing to do]]

links.name: Could the boat take me back to the mainland?|Mainland
links.link: Could the boat take me back to the mainland?|Mainland

links.name: No thanks. I have to get back to fishing.|Fishing to do
links.link: No thanks. I have to get back to fishing.|Fishing to do

passages.name: Continue2
